statements: SELECT * FROM AnimalMovements;
SELECT animal_id, movement_type, timestamp FROM AnimalMovements WHERE animal_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM AnimalMovements ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT animal_id, movement_type, from_location, to_location FROM AnimalMovements WHERE movement_type = 'Walking';
SELECT animal_id, timestamp, from_location, to_location FROM AnimalMovements WHERE animal_id = 2 ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
SELECT * FROM AnimalMovements WHERE movement_type = 'Walking' ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT animal_id, movement_type, to_location FROM AnimalMovements WHERE from_location = 'Forest';
SELECT * FROM AnimalMovements WHERE movement_type = 'Flying' AND timestamp >= '2022-01-01' AND timestamp <= '2022-02-01' ORDER BY animal_id ASC;
SELECT animal_id, from_location, to_location FROM AnimalMovements WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-03-01';
SELECT animal_id, movement_type, from_location, to_location FROM AnimalMovements WHERE movement_type IN ('Walking', 'Running') ORDER BY animal_id, timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM Animal;
SELECT animal_id, species, location_id, last_seen FROM Animal;
SELECT species, location_id FROM Animal WHERE location_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM Animal ORDER BY last_seen DESC;
SELECT location_id, COUNT(animal_id) AS total_animals FROM Animal GROUP BY location_id;
SELECT * FROM Animal WHERE species = 'Lion';
SELECT * FROM Animal WHERE location_id = 3 ORDER BY last_seen DESC;
SELECT species, location_name FROM Animal JOIN Location ON Animal.location_id = Location.location_id WHERE facility_type = 'Zoo';
SELECT AVG(facility_area) AS avg_area FROM Location WHERE facility_type = 'Safari Park';
SELECT animal_id, species, last_seen FROM Animal WHERE species LIKE '%cat%' ORDER BY last_seen ASC;
SELECT * FROM Animal;
SELECT animal_type, arrival_time, departure_time FROM Animal WHERE facility_id = 1;
SELECT facility_name, location FROM Facility WHERE facility_name LIKE 'Zoo%';
SELECT animal_id, animal_type, arrival_time FROM Animal WHERE arrival_time > '2022-01-01';

SELECT animal_type, facility_name, movement_time FROM Animal JOIN Facility ON Animal.facility_id = Facility.facility_id JOIN Movement ON Animal.animal_id = Movement.animal_id WHERE movement_type = 'Transfer';
SELECT * FROM Animal;
SELECT animal_id, animal_type, arrival_time FROM Animal WHERE facility_id = 1;
SELECT facility_id, facility_name FROM Facility WHERE location = 'Zoo';
SELECT movement_id, movement_time, movement_type FROM Movement ORDER BY movement_time DESC;

SELECT a.animal_id, a.animal_type, f.facility_name, m.movement_time FROM Animal a JOIN Facility f ON a.facility_id = f.facility_id JOIN Movement m ON a.animal_id = m.animal_id WHERE m.movement_type = 'Transfer' ORDER BY m.movement_time ASC;
SELECT * FROM location_tracking
SELECT animal_id, location, entry_time FROM location_tracking WHERE animal_id = 1
SELECT zone_id, zone_name FROM facility_zone ORDER BY zone_name
SELECT sensor_id, temperature, humidity FROM sensor_data WHERE temperature > 25
SELECT animal_id, location, movement_time FROM animal_movement
SELECT * FROM facility_zone ORDER BY zone_name DESC;
SELECT animal_id, location, movement_time FROM animal_movement WHERE animal_id = 1001;
SELECT sensor_id, location, temperature, humidity FROM sensor_data WHERE temperature > 25 AND humidity < 50;
SELECT animal_id, location, MAX(movement_time) AS last_movement FROM animal_movement GROUP BY animal_id ORDER BY last_movement DESC;
SELECT animal_id, location, entry_time FROM location_tracking WHERE entry_time BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-01';
SELECT * FROM Animal;
SELECT name, species FROM Animal WHERE age > 5;
SELECT * FROM Facility ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT id, name, location FROM Movement WHERE from_location = 'Zoo';
SELECT * FROM Staff WHERE role = 'Veterinarian' AND contact IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM Animal WHERE species = 'Dog';
SELECT name, species, age FROM Animal WHERE age > 5 ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT * FROM Animal WHERE location = 'Shelter A' AND species = 'Cat';
SELECT id, name, species, age FROM Animal WHERE age BETWEEN 3 AND 8 ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT id, name, location FROM Facility WHERE capacity > 50 ORDER BY location DESC;
